oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ohn T. Scopes was a resident at the W.C. Bailey House (built Approximately 1895), located on the N.E. corner of Market and 4th Streets. During the famed "Monkey Trial," residents of the boarding house included Thomas Scopes, columnist Arthur "Bugs" Baer, and the; chimpanzee, Joe Mendi.
